articles.title: HSBC forecasts brighter outlook as profits surge - BBC News
articles.description: Profits at Europe's biggest bank jump as it releases some cash it had set aside for bad loans.
articles.content:

HSBC has reported stronger than expected profits and says the economic outlook is looking brighter.

articles.title: Spotify Begins Raising Prices With Family Plans in US, UK - Billboard
articles.description: Spotify is raising prices on family plans in the United States and additional tiers in the U.K. and Europe, which may signify a stepping stone in its growth.
articles.content: Meanwhile, in the U.K., Student, Duo and Family Plan subscriptions will also see a price hike, up one pound apiece for Student and Duo plans to £5.99/month and £13.99/month, respectively, with Family… [+3842 chars]

articles.title: Ursula von der Leyen, one of the most powerful women in Europe, says she still faces sexism - The Washington Post
articles.description: The European Commission president said she expected other female politicians knew how she felt.
articles.content: Instead of a chair, von der Leyen was relegated to a lower-status sofa, across from the Turkish foreign minister whom she outranks. A video of von der Leyens surprised and clearly frustrated reaction… [+3196 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea tooled-up for semi-final away day at Madrid - RTE.ie
articles.description: Chelsea's young squad might lack for experience heading into Tuesday's Champions League semi-final clash against European giants Real Madrid, but coach Thomas Tuchel insists that his fast-improving Blues have all the tools required for victory.

articles.title: Football: Italian clubs who break away to European Super League will be banned from Serie A - CNA
articles.description: The Italian football federation (FIGC) said on Monday that clubs who join a breakaway league would be banned from all domestic competitions including Serie A.
articles.content:
ROME: The Italian football federation (FIGC) said on Monday (Apr 26) that clubs who join a breakaway league would be banned from all domestic competitions including Serie A.
